column5: This beautiful 2 bedroom, one bath condo is situated right on the beach and gulf of Mexico and is perfect for the family or romantic getaway. The master bedroom has a king size bed and the second bedroom has 2 twin size beds (one with a trundle). Both rooms are equipped with cable TV. Much of the condo has been recently updated and has a fully equipped kitchen with refrigerator, microwave, stove and all the utensils you will need to feel at home.
column8: Yes this is really your ocean view.
